mapper.select: SELECT PostID, Type, InsertUserName, body, Tags, CountComments, CountBookmarks, CountViews, Closed, IsBroadcast, DateInserted, DateUpdated, isActive, image FROM POST, User WHERE POSTID = #{PostID} AND Post.InsertUserName = User.username
mapper.insert: INSERT into Post (InsertUserName, body, Tags, CountComments, CountBookmarks, CountViews, Closed, IsBroadcast, DateInserted,DateUpdated, isActive, Type) VALUES (#{insertUsername},#{body},#{tags}, #{countComments}, #{countBookmarks}, #{countViews}, #{closed},#{isBroadcast}, #{dateInserted}, #{dateUpdated}, #{isActive}, #{type})

INSERT into PostTag(PostID, TagID, CreateTime) VALUES
(#{PostTag.postID}, #{PostTag.tagId}, #{PostTag.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PostID, Type, InsertUserName, body, Tags, CountComments, CountBookmarks, CountViews, Closed, IsBroadcast, DateInserted, DateUpdated, isActive, User.image FROM Post, User WHERE Post.InsertUserName IN( SELECT FollowingUser FROM Follow WHERE Username = #{username} )AND (Post.InsertUserName = User.Username) AND (DateInserted >= #{begin}) AND (DateInserted <= #{end}) AND (isActive = 1) ORDER BY DateInserted DESC

SELECT DISTINCT PostID, Type, InsertUserName, body, Tags, CountComments, CountBookmarks, CountViews, Closed, IsBroadcast, DateInserted, DateUpdated, isActive, User.image, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Age, CancerType, Metastasis, Stage FROM Post, User WHERE ((Post.InsertUserName IN( SELECT FollowingUser FROM Follow WHERE Username = #{username} ))OR( Post.InsertUserName = #{username} ) OR( PostID IN( SELECT PostID FROM PostTag WHERE PostTag.TagID IN (SELECT TagID FROM UserTag WHERE Username = #{username}) ))) AND (Post.InsertUserName = User.Username) AND (DateInserted > #{begin}) AND (DateInserted <= #{end}) AND (isActive = 1) ORDER BY DateInserted DESC
